intro.description:
To rearrange or remove plots:
• To rearrange plots: drag-and-drop a plot onto the top, side or bottom of another plot and, when the shadow border that shows where the plot will be positioned is in the right place, release the mouse.
• To remove plots: either close the plot by clicking on the X in its tab, press Ctrl+W on your keyboard, or click on File > Close.
Do this now with the shapes.rep plot:
1. Left-click and hold on the shapes.rep tab to select it.
2. Drag the tab on top of the boat1.dpf tab and, when the shadow border appears, release it.
3. Now, click on the X in the shapes.rep tab to close it.
